aima.core.probability.bayes.approx

Interface BayesSampleInference

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GibbsAsk, LikelihoodWeighting, RejectionSampling

    public interface BayesSampleInference
    General interface to be implemented by approximate Bayesian Inference algorithms.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CategoricalDistribution ask(RandomVariable[] X, AssignmentProposition[] observedEvidence, BayesianNetwork bn, int N) 

    • Method Detail

      • ask

        CategoricalDistribution ask(RandomVariable[] X,
                            AssignmentProposition[] observedEvidence,
                            BayesianNetwork bn,
                            int N)
        Parameters:
        X - the query variables.
        observedEvidence - observed values for variables E.
        bn - a Bayes net with variables {X} ∪ E ∪ Y /* Y = hidden variables
        N - the total number of samples to be generated
        Returns:
        an estimate of P(X|e).
